entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 18 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 18 except 13 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 6.
